Reviews.Title: Finally - my perfect Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Fleck
Reviews.Content: After 2 broken digital cameras (one Sony and one Nikon which broke only after 2 months of use), I can truly say this is my perfect camera.  It is portable, easy to use and takes probably the best pictures I have seen in this class of camera.It shoots readily without that long delay I have experienced with other cameras so you can truly capture the moment.  It also takes the most awesome action shots in the "sport" mode.  I went to an amusement park with my family and caught crystal clear pictures of my husband and daughter on the rides while they were in motion.  The "anti-shake" option is wonderful as well considering I am always chasing a 2 year old around for pictures.  This camera is very easy to use and at first seems like it might not have many options, but does.Overall, this is the best camera for the money and I can't say enough about it considering the plethora of problems I have had with my digital cameras in the past.

Reviews.Title: Good Things Come In Small Packages!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "music lover"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera to replace an older-than-dirt (at least in the world of technology) Sony Cybershot. It was the sleek design that attracted my eye, and the low price that kept it there! I first saw it at BJs for $140, and when I read the list of features, I thought it was too good to be true. I purchased it, and was amazed with the quality of pictures. I brought this camera on a trip to the White Mountains of NH last week, and was stunned by how many amazing shots I got. (Even my father, a long-time photographer, was amazed!)Pros:-sleek, small design-lens cover that slides open, rather than one that you may take off and lose (or one that mechanically opens, and may freeze up like my Cybershot)-high MP value for such a low price!-multiple shooting/quality modes-fine zoom-lithium-ion battery has long life (I'd say 10 hours, but I honestly haven't paid much attention to that- it hasn't been a problem for me.)-high-quality video - picture AND sound. Even looks/sounds good when hooked up to my television.Cons:-low internal memory-lithium-ion battery needs to be charged (can't simply be replaced on the go)Other than that, I can't really complain! If you're looking to find a high-quality point-and-click with a small design and a small price tag, this one's for you!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: PAV "PAV"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. Just be sure that you set the image setting to 10mf, in order to get quality photographs. There were other reviews complaining about grainy photos. Mine were grainy at first, until I realized the Image Setting was set on 03m (suitable for e-mail). Once I changed my Image Setting to 10mf, then the photos were beautiful, with clarity and detail! Also, I bought a 2G memory card, so I can store a lot of photos! I love the small size of the camera, and the many features it has to offer. Fun colors, too! Great price for an excellent camera.......just read the maual, which is on the provided CD!

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Still Love the Metal
Reviews.Content: This camera is my third digital.  So far, the only thing I don't like is that it doesn't have a sepia option.  Other than that, it's light, easy to use, and takes good pictures (not as great as I'd expect for a 10 MP camera, but good nonetheless). My first digital was a Fuji Finepix 1.3 MP and it was a great camera.  The quality of those pictures easily competed with 3 MP cameras when they came out.  My second was a Sony Cybershot - good camera, but this Finepix 10MP has better battery life and takes much better videos (with sound to my surprise).  The price on this could not be beat and I would definitely recommend it to the casual photographer.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Little Camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Gandara "Nini NYC"
Reviews.Content: I boutght this camera thinking that it sounded too good to be true. It had a lot of good reviews from other people.  I was not disappointed when i took it on vaction with me. the pictures were all crystal clear and all the extra features are awesome. I t is also very small and compact which makes it easier to take with you everywhere you go.

Reviews.Title: Killer Zoom
Reviews.Author: N. Isabella
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera refurbished for $90. I had experience with its 7MP predecessor, so trusted that it would be quality.Photos are crisp and clear, even in low light conditions without flash. The manual setting allows you to play with all the photographic parameters, although a professional would hate to have to go through several menu options just to adjust the ISO setting. For anyone else, this won't be a problem.The menu is clear and easy to use. Switching the factory programed lighting settings (party, portrait, night, beach, snow, etc.) can be done very quickly. And shutter response time for action shots is very good. There is a delay though, when taking photos in low light with or without flash.Videos are mp4 format. The quality is what you would expect from a camera, comparable to a lot of what you see on youtube. It's adequate. I have no complaints, especially since it allows you to zoom while recording, which its 7MP predecessor did not.What I really love though, is the zoom abilities of this camera. There's a 3x optical zoom, but if you've selected the right menu option, the digital zoom kicks in once you've maxed out at 3x. I'm not sure how many x's the diital zoom adds, but I was able to zoom in on a jet plane flying at high altitude and get a clear photograph of it when to the naked eye, all you saw was a dot with a white streak trailing behind it....

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: T. Brewer
Reviews.Content: takes good pictures and has a few cool stamps and such. I bought this for my daughter and she loves it,and thats the main thing. the only thing i dont like is the slide shows and viewer goes kinda slow to get to the next pic.overall a good buy though.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: E. Stidd "Stiddmaster"
Reviews.Content: I like that you don't have to wait for the lens to adjust when you first turn it on or after you take a picture. When you turn it on it is automatically ready for a picture. I also like the way you turn it on. I bought mine just a week ago when we were in Washington DC. It worked perfectly for what I wanted. I wanted to be able to take a pic here, turn it off(to save battery) but have it ready to take a pic again as soon as I needed it. I could turn it off and on really quickly without looking. I also love all the features. I looked over many cameras like it, and found it to be the best for the price. It is packed with awesome features, on top of being a 10 megapixel which I wanted. It comes with its own battery and a charger. It doesn't use AA batteries, which some people might like or dislike. I liked it cause it doesn't take that long to charge, but it lasted the whole time I was taking pics, all the way until my card was full. Which AA batteries I am pretty sure wouldn't come close to. So you don't use as many which is cheaper, and you don't have to carry them around with you. The other plus to not having to use AA is it makes the camera able to be a lot more compact unlike most cameras. I love that you can get it in different colors, whatever your personality it. I like the different unique modes it has, that I haven't seen in other cameras, like snow, beach, landscape, sunset. So I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: fiji fine pix
Reviews.Author: C. Hill
Reviews.Content: I love the size, the color, the large lcd screen, and the fact the it plays slide shows on the camera.  Its easy and fun to use.  Only gave it 4 stars because the red-eye reduction that's automatically in the camera makes the eyes look strange sometimes and I have not yet figured out how to stop it.  Otherwise, I love it!

Reviews.Title: Sharp 'n Easy
Reviews.Author: C. Schormann
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm Finepix 10MP camera is by far the best digital cam I have ever used. I have a higher end Canon 8MP and this blows those pix away. Ease of use and small portable size along with easy connectivity make this a real winner. BTW it cost $600 less than the Canon.

Reviews.Title: new camera
Reviews.Author: A. B. Hoelscher
Reviews.Content: Camera is very limited with no view finder. Have to use lcd screen to compose picture. Not really very happy with it.Have to admit that it takes good quality video. Would not recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: FujiFilm Finepix Z20fd 10 MP w/3x Zoom - Hot Pink
Reviews.Author: Carla Strong "CARLASPETS"
Reviews.Content: I have only had the camera a couple of weeks but have found it to be an excellent purchase!  I have taken several flawless photos even at the Daytona 500 last weekend (2/15/09).  Very easy to use even for the beginner!  Feel free to order this product with confidence...

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: K. Uribe "imreal"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for our Daughter for Christmas, I want one now!! I have a Fuji fine pix (different style) which I love but this one is sleek and has a few features mine does not, and  the price was awesome!! Great product would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Not terrible but not great either
Reviews.Author: mariabelle01
Reviews.Content: I just used this for the 1st time today so no input about durability.  I will likely not keep this camera, b/c I think for it's basic functionality you could get one that is cheaper and likely better.  Drawbacks: There is no viewer, you only have the digital screen to use to see your shot.  Battery died extremely fast, took about 60-75 pictures max. Shutter speed is super slow, most pics I took were no good because it was the shot 5-10 seconds after I pushed the button.  Also, for 10 mp the picture quality isn't great, really quite grainy.

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: M. Perrie
Reviews.Content: Good camera Bought it for my daughter she loves it. Works well not much control over some of the settings like ISO. It would help to create better shots but good deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Makes Great Camera's
Reviews.Author: Jim C
Reviews.Content: Purchased two cameras for christmas gifts. I have had a Fuji Finepix for the last three years and was impressed with the quality.This manufacturer has done all the right things. It is easy to use andupload your pictures to your computer. The camera has a very good sizeview finder and screen to see your work. The optical zoom does not diffusethe lines of your shot. This camera is used to send pictures of land toclients as well as taking pictures of the family and pets.  Our twelveyear old has no problem shooting shots of the running pets or his friends wrestling. Do yourself a favor buy it the price on Amazon is unbeatable.

Reviews.Title: Great point & shoot - but video can't be rotated
Reviews.Author: Ann Russell "AnnR"
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera and its many features but am disappointed that the mpeg video format can't be rotated!  I turned the camera sideways to take video in Disney World and upon returning home, discovered I would have to purchase an AVI conversion program to rotate the video to view.  Otherwise, am very happy with the point & shoot capabilities.  Any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Fuji Does It.
Reviews.Author: J. Cardenas Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: slim, not heavy, pink, fast, high resolution pictures, buy for a gift, today someone loves me much more than yesterday. I love e-commerce. Thank's AMAZON.COM

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: L. Gandre "SewCre8ive"
Reviews.Content: I needed a digital Camera that was EASY-This one did the trick! Pictures are clear and the Intelligent face detection and Red-Eye removal feature makes eveyone look so much better on film. The software loaded quickly and was easy to use AND works with Vista! I bought it in pink so it was quick to identify as mine.

Reviews.Title: Loving it...
Reviews.Author: Jupes569 "Lil G's momma"
Reviews.Content: I love my new tiny cute pink camera. I purchased my first digital camera (a Fuji) 3 1/2 years ago- and cameras have come a looooong way, baby. I love that it takes video with sound. The pictures come out beautifully. I can't wait for my trip to NY next month so I can take lots of pics and vidoes.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a college student on a budget
Reviews.Author: R. Arnold
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I recently went on a college trip to England, and one of the other girls on the trip had this camera. I like the way it worked in a range of settings. It worked everywhere from the dimly lit London pubs to flower gardens on bright sunny days. It was small and efficient. When I went looking for a new camera, I kept this one in mind. And as a college student on a budget, I must say I'm very pleased that I decided to buy it.This is a great value for a good, quality point and shoot camera. It has settings for a range of situations. I'm not a pro photographer by any means, but I recently used it to take my sister's senior portraits to try to save some money, and the pictures turned out beautifully. I shot the pictures outside and had to do some experimenting with all the different settings to get the best shots with the late afternoon light. The natural light and portrait settings helped capture the full range of colors on our outdoor backgrounds (lots of fall foliage). The face detection was definitely helpful, and the camera's 10mp gave us pictures that look great even blown up to an 8x10 size.The camera is small and sleek. Its buttons might be a little difficult for a person with not-so-nimble fingers. I love the way opening the shutter turns the camera on, but I can see how easy it would be to unknowingly turn the camera on and wear out the battery. It doesn't have a viewfinder, but I don't miss it with the big LCD screen. I definitely recommend getting a memory card to go with it simply for convenience. The camera comes with software, but you don't need it to get the pictures onto a computer.

Reviews.Title: love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Megan Dekoster
Reviews.Content: i love this camera. it was a fantastic price and it works great! i am always taking pictures with this camera! great color selection too! the only downfall is the program to upload the pictures on stinks! i am always having problems uploading my pictures from my camera onto my computer.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: A. Benitez
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera. Not only does it come in a variety of cool colors, it was great features. It can reduce red eye, detect faces and much more. The pictures come out great. It is also easy to learn how to use.

Reviews.Title: I love Fuji cameras!
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Ngai
Reviews.Content: This is my third Fujifilm Finepix, and like the two before, this camera meets and exceeds my expectations. It is relatively inexpensive, so given what you pay and what you get, it is a fabulous deal. The camera is also extremely easy to use -- I haven't even touched the owner's manual, though I'm sure I'll find more if I actually read it.I actually considered the Fujifilm Finepix Z100fd 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Pink), but after reading the reviews, I went with this one instead -- and I am so glad. I think this one looks better anyway, and the difference in zoom power makes hardly any difference. And, really, who needs to stand THAT far from the picture's subject?

Reviews.Title: If you're not concerned with quality...
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: When I first bought this camera it was ok enough for me to not take it back immediately. Wish I had! Won't focus at all half the time and if you want to zoom at all everything is ALWAYS blurry. Someone else mentioned that all the shots are overexposed, I also found that to be true. Just a bad camera all around. Yes it's small and cute but you will be kicking yourself when your pics are just garbage.

Reviews.Title: best ever!
Reviews.Author: paula grooms
Reviews.Content: first off I couldn't believe the remarkable price I had found on this camera here on amazon..when I recieved it.. I thought awe..how cute..this little remarkable camera and video..takes the best ever pictures and the video and sounds coming from this cute camera are icredibly awesome. I had bought my camera back in Febuary so after using it for some months now I had to make my own review..I have a 9 year old daughter who loves taking pics and videos..this camera has been dropped a few times once even leaving a small dent and it still works just as good as the first time using it..would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Bad photos but good camera
Reviews.Author: K. Walters
Reviews.Content: The photos came out pretty bad. In pictures my face was washed out and I looked 20 years older than I am. The video camera is good though. Takes great video images.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: music mom
Reviews.Content: I've just had this camera a couple of days now, and haven't printed any pictures yet; but one of the main things I was looking for which is being able to get close for close ups works great.  I had just tried and returned another small camera with 10mp, but it wouldn't focus up close like this one does.I think I'll go print some pictures now!Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Hot Pink)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera good price
Reviews.Author: SAD DAD
Reviews.Content: We have had nothing but great pictures and vids from this unit. We chose it because we have abused and killed FIVE other digital cameras so we knew we wanted NO moving lens, NO software and LINUX friendly. VERY VERY happy with this camera.We also bought the "Fujifilm Finepix Z37 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD" at the same time and reviewed it.

Reviews.Title: The best camera I've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: A.J.
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect. It's not too complicated, it's an adorable color, and it takes great pictures in the dark. Everything a girl needs.Shipped fast and was in PERFECT condition despite being used. LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with this camera!
Reviews.Author: Denise Bettge
Reviews.Content: I really like how easy it is to use and it's compact size.  The rechargable battery lasts quite a long time, and it takes an SD card which I can pop right into my laptop. It has quite a few different settings for different situations and if I'm on the right setting the pictures come out great. I am pleased w/the picture quality and recommend this for someone who wants a decent point and shoot lightweight camera at a good price..with simple settings. I've had several small digital cameras and this one is my favorite so far, and also the least expensive.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy With Customer Service
Reviews.Author: M. Cable
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about a month ago and after using it for a few weekes, I noticed a vertical line appearing in the same spot in all of my pictures that were taken without flash.  I ended up calling the Support Center and was told to send the camera in for repair or exchange.  I felt the woman I spoke to from Service and Repair was very rude to me during the phone call and seemed annoyed to have to my questions.I ended up sending my camera back earlier today after speaking to the woman on the phone.  I'm not too happy about having to get a brand new camera repaired for something that was clearly wrong with it before I even purchased it (and having to pay to get it shipped to the Repair Center).  I bought this camera specifically for a trip that I'm taking in about a month and who knows if it will even make it back in time.I will certainly think twice before making another Fujifilm purchase after going through this situation.  My sister was planning on purchasing the same camera in the near future, but I will be encouraging her to look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera
Reviews.Author: RaiderFan75 "RaiderFan75"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my 16 y/o daughter.  She loves it.  Very thin and easy to operate.  Takes great pictures!  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: K. Bernath "John's Mom"
Reviews.Content: I have a terrible tendency to drop my cameras, and needed a new one before going on a trip with my friends.  I did some research and learned that this camera actually had a lot of features and was less expensive than it's competitors.  I don't know how they do it, but I have to say I was impressed.  This camera rocks - I went with 3 other friends and by far my camera took the best pictures.  I brought the cable to hook up to the TV and we reviewed our pictures and video clips every night.  The picture quality is excellent, the camera is small and easy to carry around, and the rechargeable battery holds a good charge.  It also comes in several fun colors - I can't see a reason why you shouldn't consider this camera, it rocks!

Reviews.Title: This camera is awesome!
Reviews.Author: M. Yake "M.Yake"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! Its such a great price for a ten megapixel camera. Awesome quality and easy to use. A great buy!

Reviews.Title: It's pretty average
Reviews.Author: Rane E Stark
Reviews.Content: This isn't a bad camera, but it isn't great either.  It is really just average.  The photos are decent quality, but tend to be very grainy even in full light.  I'm not happy with the flash.  The LCD flash is too bright and white, imo.  The idea of a point and shoot is that you don't have to mess around with it too much when you want to take a picture, but with the flash being so bright it defeats the purpose.  The pictures look great if it is really bright or really dark.  Anything in between the flash will wash things out unless you play with the settings.The location of the lens is not a good thing, either.  I am constantly getting my thumb in front of it.The camera has some good qualities.  It's very small and light.  The color is cute.  10MP means it can take very large pictures.  The lens cover protects the lens and automatically turns the camera on, which is a very nice feature.  It is possible, with some messing around with settings, to get very nice pictures.  It does take fantastic video in different light settings.  If I had bought it to take video I might be happier with it.So it isn't all bad, and it isn't all good.  As I said in the beginning, it is average.  If I had it to do over again I would have bought something different.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Prentice House "LEE"
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera for my daughter.  She loves it, and she uses it with her Toshiba laptop.  It fits like a glove.

Reviews.Title: Fuji camera
Reviews.Author: Natalie Farrell "Natster"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my oldest daughter for her B day and she loves it.Sturdy camera ,nice pics

Reviews.Title: Tech for Less Sucks. Kind of.
Reviews.Author: Erik Pettee
Reviews.Content: Seems like a decent product, but I went through two returns with Tech for Less - an Amazon merchant. They were very courteous throughout the transaction and provided fast service, but I had to return two factory-refurbished cameras in a row for defects. One was pretty bad. It wasn't at all in the shape described. I think they are actually drop shipping from some other provider because they didn't have the product in hand to where they could tell me what it looked like, anything about its quality, etc.Overall, from the little interaction I had with the camera, I'd say it's worth about $100 max.

Reviews.Title: fast shipping and looks very nice
Reviews.Author: Joseph F. Wagener "joe"
Reviews.Content: ordered this for my daughter for xmas so have not used it yet but it looks very nice.

Reviews.Title: It's cute! but...
Reviews.Author: lazy mommy
Reviews.Content: my hands  are maybe too big for this camera.  My left forefinger is always touch or cover to lens.  If I try to avoid that I covered microphone (it's not good when I take a movie).  I gave up to hold secure and decided to return it.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: S. Blanton
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera as a graduation gift-unfortunately when my niece opened the box, we realized there was no battery or USB cord. After wasting half the day of graduation in search of a battery,we realized it was not even a Fuji Z20 but actually a Z10 in a Z20 box.  Clearly the definition of "new" maybe different to Amazon than to its customers. Had to buy a backup the next day at trusty Walmart but we were left with no graduation pictures.  I typically have great experiences with Amazon, but perhaps I should stick to books -no batteries needed.

ProductInfo.Features:
10-megapixel sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
3x optical zoom with Picture Stabilization; 2.5-inch LCD display
Face Detection optimizes focus/exposure for up to 10 faces; Blog Mode copies 640 x 480 version of image for easy upload
Wirelessly transfer images to IrSimple-equipped devices, including other digital cameras
Stores images on xD or SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Hot Pink)
